title: (x) Fenway Park sans caps - similar to Blair/Engravers Gothic/Sackers Gothic {Ken}
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20090416124935im_/http:/typophile.com/files/fenway395_4500.jpg)
  
Does anybody know a font similar to the one used for the words “Fenway Park” in this image?
author: roggelito

comments.content: Blair and Engravers Gothic are similar but a bit wider.
Trade Gothic Extended is a bit too wide as well — try Interstate or Gotham, maybe ?

GO ROCKIES!!!

(I’m a cranky yankee)

I think Sackers/Engravers Gothic is the closest you’ll find.
I bet that’s custom type. It looks similar to Interstate. It’s not as tall as Interstate.
Thanks, Engravers or Blair will do fine.
sackers has the same sort of endearing klutziness to the R.
It is gotham Medium. and the vertical nature of the font is altered. all of the horizontal lines have been raised. But its gotta be gotham medium or bold.
